entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@FLOTUS @WhiteHouse Up to 90% of COVID-19 deaths could have been prevented had the U.S. moved to shut down by March 2nd. Instead, Trump dragged his feet for another 2 weeks, as the virus continued a deadly assault. By early May, more than 79,000 Americans were dead.
https://t.co/OKPMx449wv
